item.description:
Hi Everyone!

I wanted to get everyone together for brunch. I want it to be an informal get together and in a laid back atmosphere. I am a BIG fan of diners, but someone else made know of a hidden gem that I have yet to discover.

I have noticed a lot of new people joining the group and I think it is definitely time for all of us to meet!

Johnny D's in Somerville it is. http://www.johnnyds.c...
Cut and paste the link to get directions if you aren't sure how to get there. I am even going to try to RSVP.

Thanks! I hope everyone can make it!

Emilie
item.name: Get to know everyone Brunch!
